channel.title: Cointelegraph.com News
channel.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

image.title: Cointelegraph.com News
image.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

item.title: Binance.US taps MoonPay as banking alternative to regain USD ramps
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Mitchelhill
item.description: After having its banking ties slashed, crypto exchange Binance.US has revived its U.S. dollar on-ramp through a new partnership with MoonPay.

item.title: BlockFi argues FTX, Three Arrows Capital isn't entitled to repayments
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brayden Lindrea
item.description: BlockFi argues its creditors, not FTX’s, are the “ultimate victims” of FTX’s alleged fraud.

item.title: Australian CBDC may be useful for payments, tokenization: Central bank
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Mitchelhill
item.description: The RBA has wrapped up its CBDC pilot program and outlined four key areas that could be improved by the introduction of central bank-issued digital currency.

item.title: OpenSea manager accused of insider trading sentenced to 3 months in prison, $50K fine
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: Nathaniel Chastain will reportedly have until Nov. 2 to surrender himself following his conviction for wire fraud and money laundering related to insider trading on OpenSea.

item.title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Serge Egon Ostman
item.category: why did the Fed pause rates
item.description: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

item.title: Is the 25% drop in PEPE, SHIB and APE a sign of a deepening crypto bear market?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marcel Pechman
item.description: Memecoins reflect a higher beta to the entire crypto sector, but does their recent 25% price drop signal a deepening bear market for BTC, ETH and large caps?

item.title: World Mobile launches on Google Play for customers in Australia, Canada, UK and US
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tristan Greene
item.description: The company also announced a partnership with artificial intelligence company SingularityNET.

item.title: Stellar joins Bytecode Alliance to help develop EVM alternative Wasm
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Blackstone
item.description: Stellar joined the industry group developing Wasm, an alternative computation engine for running smart contracts.

item.title: First Republican presidential debate to feature pro-crypto candidates
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis and businessman Vivek Ramaswamy will be in attendance at the political debate on Aug. 23, but not Miami Mayor Francis Suarez, despite earlier claims.

item.title: BlackRock has more to lose from a BTC price crash pre-Bitcoin ETF
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marcel Pechman
item.description: The argument that BlackRock gains from cheaper Bitcoin for its ETF launch isn’t straightforward, and neither is the idea that the government is suppressing BTC’s price.

item.title: Bitcoin analyst eyes ‘V-shape’ BTC price bounce as RSI hits 5-year low
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: BTC price’s “death chop” continues to characterize the aftermath of last week's Bitcoin flash crash.

item.title: Chinese official sentenced to life in prison for Bitcoin mining, corruption
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: Xiao Yi was accused of abuse of power and corruption in operating a $329 million Bitcoin mining enterprise.

item.title: Blockchain takes the stage at Longevity+DeSci summit in New York
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Vittoria Benzine
item.description: This year’s Longevity+DeSci Summit in New York City showcased several decentralized solutions.

item.title: FTX’s Sam Bankman-Fried pleads not guilty to fraud charges: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Prashant Jha
item.description: Sam Bankman-Fried, the former CEO and founder of now-defunct crypto exchange FTX, reportedly pleaded not guilty to fraud and money laundering charges in a court hearing on Aug. 22.

item.title: Crypto amplified financial risks in emerging markets: BIS papers
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: The central banks of the United States, Canada, Mexico and Brazil have pointed out the risks of crypto but warned against excessively prohibitive laws.

item.title: Crypto Banter’s Ran Neuner says Ripple is ‘despicable,’ tips hat to ZachXBT: Hall of Flame
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ciaran Lyons
item.description: Crypto Banter host Ran Neuner takes aim at Ripple and FatMan Terra, tips his hat to ZachXBT and explains his young kids can read charts.

item.title: Crypto P2P scams in India show digital asset education is needed
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Prashant Jha
item.description: Scammers have made it impossible for Indian crypto traders to conduct P2P trades owing to several police complaints and bank account freezes that follow.

item.title: Germany proposes screening Chinese investment in AI and related sectors: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Savannah Fortis
item.description: The German government proposed tighter export controls on China for semiconductors and AI technology similar to measures from U.S. regulators.

item.title: ZK-proof Web3 infrastructure developer gets backing from Binance Labs
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Gareth Jenkinson
item.description: Delphinus Lab is building a zero-knowledge proof rollup service aimed at powering Web3 application development.

item.title: Bitcoin is in ‘new bull cycle’ — Metric that bottomed before 70% gains
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: Bitcoin Realized Cap HODL Waves signal that the current bull market launch is a classic repeat of BTC price history.

item.title: SEC–Ripple lawsuit cost XRP 3 years of adoption: Lawyer
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Prashant Jha
item.description: Crypto lawyer John Deaton cited several instances where major crypto players, such as Coinbase, reached out to the SEC for regulatory clarification before listing XRP, but didn’t face any objection.

item.title: Terra.money website frozen to prevent more phishing scams
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: The freeze comes shortly after Terra’s website was compromised over the weekend by hackers who attempted to scam users via phishing attacks.

item.title: South Korean city to seize crypto from thousands of tax evaders: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: City authorities of Cheongju are looking to seize cryptocurrency from anyone who owes at least $750 in crypto taxes to the government.

item.title: YouTube releases ‘principles’ for working with music industry on AI tech
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Savannah Fortis
item.description: The streaming platform revealed three key principles it will abide by as it works with major figures in the music industry to better grasp AI technologies.

item.title: Oman launches $350M crypto mining center: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By David Attlee
item.description: The mining facility comes as part of a plan to accelerate the digitalization of Oman’s economy, which is mainly dependent on oil exports.

item.title: Nomura, CoinShares, Ledger joint venture Komainu wins Dubai crypto license
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Arijit Sarkar
item.description: Komainu completed the final step in VARA’s licensing process nearly 10 months after securing its MVP license in November 2022.

item.title: Sam Bankman-Fried prosecutors submit proposed jury instructions for trial
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Jesse Coghlan
item.description: Ahead of FTX co-founder Sam Bankman-Fried’s October trial, government prosecutors have laid out their requests for how the jury should be directed.

item.title: Firms have mere hours to deflect cyberattacks, warns cybersecurity CEO
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Martin Young
item.description: Palo Alto Networks CEO Nikesh Arora has warned that “bad actors are getting faster” and stressed that companies need to beef up cybersecurity defenses.

item.title: Mysterious Bitcoin wallet becomes 3rd largest BTC holder in 3 months
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Mitchelhill
item.description: An unknown wallet has accrued more than $3 billion worth of Bitcoin in the last three months, sparking a wave of theories about the potential owner.

item.title: Gold-backed BRICS currency will be ‘very hard’ to deliver: Lyn Alden
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brayden Lindrea
item.description: A common currency would be challenging for Brazil, Russia, India, China and South Africa to initiate and maintain, but it could have an impact on Bitcoin, investment strategist Lyn Alden says.
